p: We evaluated isolation by distance within Europe using four different measures of genetic differentiation between pairs of populations: pairwise genetic distance, proportion of shared alleles and pairwise F ST and R ST values in the form of F ST/(1-F ST) and R ST/(1-R ST) respectively (Table 6, Additional file 7). Geographic distance was related to F ST/(1-F ST) and genetic distance (Mantel test, F ST/[1-F ST]: p < 0.001, r 2 = 0.372; D CH: p < 0.01, r 2 = 0.295) but not to the proportion of shared alleles or R ST/(1-R ST) (Mantel test, proportion of shared alleles: p = 0.999, r 2 = 0.030; R ST/[1-R ST]: p = 0.08, r 2 = 0.204).
